page.title: 17LEVEN VALLEY POLLUTION
page.content: MOST LITTER IS DROPPED BY PEOPLE FROM CARS THEREFORE WE SURVEYED POLLUTION ALONG THE MAIN ROADS.OUR MAIN OBSERVATION WAS THAT MOST POLLUTION OCCURRED WHERE ROADS WERE STEEPEST AND CARS WOULD SLOW DOWN. TWO MAIN TYPES OF POLLUTION EXIST. FIRST,PEOPLE DELIBERATELY DUMPING A LOAD OF RUBBISH.THE BEST EXAMPLE OF THIS WAS AN OLD DISUSED QUARRY WHICH HAD BEEN LANDSCAPED TO IMPROVE THE ENVIRONMENT.HOWEVER PEOPLE HAVE DUMPED RUBBISH LIKE CANS,CERAMIC TILES AND FULL POLYTHENE BAGS WHICH HAVE BURST. AN EXAMPLE OF THE OTHER POLLUTION WAS IN THE ROAD WEST FROM LESLIE.THER WE NOTICED DROPPED FROM MOVING CARS THERE WERE MANY EMBASSY REGAL CIGARETTE PACKETS AND PAPER.THESE ARE BIODEGRADEABLE WHEREAS POLYTHENE,COKE CANS,PLASTIC BOTTLES AND FOIL DISHES FROM CARRYOUT MEALS ARE NOT.
